text: Sumo ʙa coi u [cizero] nameparasted, magar nomhoe [ʙema'ni], ki xud va padaronaton ʙar onho nihodaed. Alloh taolo hec dalele ʙar [haqiqati] onho nozil nakardaast. Farmonravoi, tanho az oni Alloh taolo ast [va] farmon dodast, ki cuz Uro naparasted. In hamon dini rost va ustuvor ast; vale ʙestari mardum namedonand
